post.body: Hay! Where did the realjohndoe@zeroid go? He posted good stuff.

It's funny and sad that the #Jew Wall Street banksters are punishing #Facebook because #Zuckerberg a Jew won't sellout his soul by censoring so-called holocaust deniers free speech, constitutional rights and human rights. Facebook and #Twitter Etc couldn't be ethical or moral even if they wanted to be.

The cult of #Judaism (pedophile cocksuckers). A gilded cage with a dick up your ass for life. Where is the RJD when we need him..üò±üòÇüóΩ

comment.body: @Zorke:  Agree, very impressed with the clean, simple, thoughtful design. Yet very powerful. The guy really knows his stuff. Great UI, attractive too..üëçüòÄ

@Chandelier: Hay thanks., I did. He said he thinks he got banned from zerome. So much for decentralisation, no central server and alleged censorship resistance. He's been getting a shit load of cyber attacks on zeronet. Says he's a dickhead, so he's use to it. But he still thinks zeronet is awesome though. Huge potential..üëçüòÄ
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: Lol Nah.. RJD was just doing his part beta testing the system for those that can't handle the blowback..‚úåüòÄ

@Chandelier: He tried that, but it didn't work. Thinks it's some kind of device or global block on his laptop, and has crashed his phone hard! on several occasions. Not for the faint of heart..üòßüòÄ

@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: what RJD was able to show was that a core part of zeronet is very centralized. And that's a big problem for a supposed decentralized network. That's the same trap much of the internet is in today. Regardless zeronet is awesome. And I suspect the centralization problem is fixable. There is a Huge! difference between one user blocking or muting another users post, and a few people or an individual deciding for everyone else that another users post won't be seen or heard. That mentally is known as hubris.

@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: @Chandelier:  "next level trolling" not so. All RJD did was post some beautiful pictures of wemon. Then he was viciously attacked by some self appointed vigilante censors. Attempting to suppress his free speech and freedom of expression. Cheapening and violating his art by labaling it with #NSFW!!! He's been Violated!!! As to how to fix the ZeroMe centralization problem the solution seems obvious. Make ZerMe cloneable just like all the other zites. All ZeroMe clones would still share the same zeronet ecosystem. They could even federate with each other. As with #Bitcoin you could have a ZeroMe Core and a ZeroMe UnChained!!!..üòÇ Or ZeroMeAlt. Just imagine, an anonymous ZeroMeAlt. Just set it up and let it evolve on it's own freedom and personal responsibility. No moderation or censorship. Just mute and personal taste.. WOW!!!..üëçüòÄ I would never want to be responsible for censoring or moderating anyone's free speech or their other human rights. Well that's how I think Zeronet will evolve. That's the Holy Grail..üòâ
@Pexo:  He disappeared  because he was full of shit..üò±üòï
